title: Welcome to my portfolio!
introduction: I'm Ted Tasman, a Computer Science student at Penn State who is passionate about using technology to make a positive impact in the world. My journey in tech has been driven by curiosity and a love for problem-solving, whether it’s through building predictive models or developing web applications.
personal_experiences: Beyond the technical skills, I value the experiences that have shaped who I am today. Working in the food service industry taught me the importance of teamwork and communication, skills that are just as crucial in tech as they are in any other field. These experiences have underscored my commitment to collaboration and my ability to thrive in dynamic environments.
interests: When I'm not coding, you might find me indulging in one of my many interests. I love playing guitar, biking on the road or trails, and cooking up new recipes in the kitchen. I'm also an avid gamer, and I enjoy exploring the latest in the world of finance.
conclusion: I'm a firm believer in the transformative power of technology and am eager to apply my skills to projects that can drive meaningful change. Whether it’s through an internship, a collaborative project, or just connecting with like-minded individuals, I’m excited about the opportunities ahead.
closing: Thank you for visiting my portfolio. Feel free to explore around to learn more about my various projects and experiences. After that, use the links in the top right to connect with me, and we can embark on this exciting journey together!
